beats.title: Render View
beats.scenario: Render Complete Dynamic View with All Components
acceptanceCriteria:
Given a complete view configuration with sections, fields, rules
When renderView is invoked
Then the entire form is rendered within 500ms
And all interactive elements are functional
And no rendering errors or warnings appear in console

Given a large view with 200+ fields
When renderView processes it
Then rendering completes within 800ms
And initial interaction latency is < 100ms
And memory footprint is optimized (no memory leaks)

Given responsive design requirements
When renderView renders
Then layout adapts to viewport (desktop, tablet, mobile)
And touch targets are minimum 44x44px on mobile
And text is readable at all zoom levels

Given accessibility requirements (WCAG 2.1 AA)
When renderView renders
Then all elements have proper semantic HTML
And color contrast is >= 4.5:1 for text
And keyboard navigation is fully functional

Given performance budgets
When renderView completes
Then First Contentful Paint (FCP) is < 1 second
And Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is < 2.5 seconds
And Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) is < 0.1
beats.testCase: expands viewBox when endpoints extend beyond element bounds (no rotation)
beats.userStory: As a runtime owner, I need `renderView` to render efficiently with memoization.

movements.userStory: As a UI runtime engineer, I need rendering to generate fields and sections and draw views in <200ms P95.
movements.businessValue: Enables no-code form generation; reduces form creation time from hours to minutes; supports dynamic field generation per tenant
